Newspapers (Opinions)

My opinions are my own.
 

Protect the Second Amendment Because Seconds Matter. 

The Wall Street Journal (Future View)

[www.wsj.com] [2022-05-24] 

Andrew MacGillivray.

Opinion. Selected as one of five student opinions for the 'What Should We Do About Gun Violence?' prompt in the weekly WSJ Future View publication. Appears alongside independently-written essays from Max Willner-Giwerc (University of Chicago Law School), Alicia Liu (Swarthmore College), Lucas Sundwall (Quinnipiac University School of Law), and John Macejka (University of North Carolina).

The Battle Over Taiwan. 

The Wall Street Journal (Future View)

[www.wsj.com] [2021-11-02] 

Andrew MacGillivray.

Opinion. Selected as one of five student opinions for the 'Most Dangerous Global Flashpoints' prompt in the weekly WSJ Future View publication. Appears alongside independently-written essays from Clark Irvine (Harvard University), Nicholas Martin (Quinnipiac University), Austin Dahmer, (Georgetown University), and Cameron Blanchard (University of Notre Dame).

About Me

I'm passionate about the outdoors, cars, travel, photography, and code. I've been developing software professionally since 2017.

Current Residence: Fort Myers, FL.
